name: Blue Thunder
overview: An unreleased prototype for a copter themed action game based on the movie of the same name. Game created by Earok in 2018 and that is simply a Time Events type game, in which we are presented with the final scene of the movie Blu Thunder (Blue Thunder in Spain) and we will have to press the arrow or shot keys at the moment opportune to advance through the film until reaching the end. In the style of the famous game Dragon's Lair. This was done mainly as an engine prototype for an FMV game (Dragon's Lair style), no further work is intended. The engine went on to be used as the basis for the unofficial Amiga ports of TimeGal and Road Avenger.
